TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1085
TEI.2.document_title: William Blanks to Stephen F. Austin, 05-01-1825

barker_notes.barker_summary: William Blanks to Austin, May 1, 1825. Fear of contest over his land.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 1085

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*William Blanks to Austin, May 1, 1825. Fear of contest over his land.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*Buffalow Bayou*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="05-01-1825">May 1st 1825*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Honorable Col I Expect to leave here in a few days for *location_mentioned*Tuckapaw*/location_mentioned* and I wish to inform you of my oneasiness I met with a young *person_mentioned*man */person_mentioned*on *location_mentioned*buffalow bayou*/location_mentioned* by the name of *person_mentioned*Clair */person_mentioned*he was just from *location_mentioned*tuckapaw*/location_mentioned* came in company with *person_mentioned*Mr Garner*/person_mentioned*, and I was speaking of my half league at *location_mentioned*Dickson's Camp*/location_mentioned* and he enquired if it was surveyed and I said nay, and he said he was the first man that improved it, and talkd of contending for it, and I do not know how long it has been since he quit the place, but I Expect two years I told him that the barings of the timber was taken and the beginning corner was establish, and he said he did not know that he should contend—I do not wish to be cut out of that piece by know means for it is all that I think much of, and if you think there is any dainger, I will give *person_mentioned*Mr. Ingram*/person_mentioned* some thing Cleaver to have it surveyd, or in other words maid safe, if it is not safe, I hope you under stand me;*/p* *p**person_mentioned*WM Blanks*/person_mentioned*,*/p* *p*[Addressed:]*person_mentioned* Col S, F, Austin*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*San Felipi de Austin*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*/div1*
